actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making an appropriation for fiscal year 1975 for the expenses of the National Institute of Neurological Diseases and Stroke in connection with dystonia.

summary.text: Authorizes an appropriation of $35,000,000 for fiscal year 1975 for the expenses of the National Institute of Neurological Diseases and Stroke in carrying out title IV of the Public Health Service Act with respect to dystonia.

titles.title: A bill making an appropriation for fiscal year 1975 for the expenses of the National Institute of Neurological Diseases and Stroke in connection with dystonia.
